VALID UNTIL 1055Z 
MA RI AND ME MA NH RI CSTL WTRS 
FROM 80SW YSJ-140ESE ACK-60SE ACK-40S PVD-30S ENE-80SW YSJ 
AREA TS MOV FROM 23025KT. TOPS ABV FL450. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 291055-291455 
AREA 1...FROM 60SW YSJ-180SE ACK-160SE SIE-30ENE HTO-ENE-60SW YSJ 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM 30S BVT-HMV-50SSW ECG-170ESE SBY-190ESE ECG-140SSE 
ILM-180SE CHS-30WNW IRQ-30WNW TTH-30S BVT 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
==

WSUS31 KKCI 290855 
SIGE  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 46E 
VALID UNTIL 1055Z 
VA NC TN KY IN 
FROM 20NE TTH-30ENE IIU-40SSW HMV-40SE VXV-TTH-20NE TTH 
AREA TS MOV FROM 31020KT. TOPS ABV FL450.
